column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers

column.name: CM_GROUP_TYPE
column.comment: Kind of  common market group.

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: CM_GROUP_TYP_DESC
column.comment: Description of the type of a common market group. - Description of group type.

column.name: CM_SALES_EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: Effective change date - Start date when group type gets effective.

column.name: CM_SALES_EXPIRATION_DATE
column.comment: Expiry date - End of validity date of CM group type

column.name: CM_MAX_NUM_OF_MEM
column.comment: Maximum number of effective members allowed in group. - Maximum number of effective members allowed in group.

column.name: ALLOW_SKELETON_CONTRACT_OWNER
column.comment: Flag describing if a subscriber can being under a skeleton Ban owner of a cross market. - Can a subscriber being under a skeleton Ban owner of a cross market group (Yes/No)? (default so far: No)

column.name: ALLOW_PREPAID_MEMBERS
column.comment: Can a prepaid subscriber be member of a group - Can a prepaid subscriber be member of a group (Yes/No)? (default so far: Yes)

column.name: FNN_COUNTABLE
column.comment:
Indicator telling how a fixed net number related to the owner's GSM number is considered in the group. - "N" -  Fixed net number and related GSM Number of owner are counted/regarded as "One" member. 
"F" - No Fixed net number can be added to related GSM

column.name: ZUHAUSE_PRODUCT
column.comment:
Zuhause product type - Identifies the Zuhause product type
"V" - Group types dedicated to owners having Zuhause Talk.
"W" - Group types dedicated to owners having Zuhause Web.
''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''M'''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' - Group ty

column.name: BLACK_LIST_CODE
column.comment: In the case of an F&F SOC or a Group Master PP, a Black List code indicates the restricted numbers for participating in the F&F SOC. - Reference code to blacklist table disallowing to add a member with such a subscriber no.

column.name: OWNER_SOC
column.comment: Soc code for the owner of the group.

column.name: MEMBER_SOC
column.comment: Soc code of the credit member of the group - Soc code for a credit member of the group.

column.name: IE_RELEVANT
column.comment:
This field shows if the group can be defined with help from the Incentive Engine (Y/N). -     Indicates whether the group type is a promotion type or not  
    Y - promotion type
    N - normal CM group type
    NULL will be treated by the software as

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
